description: The first and the last three leaves contain a list of different objects sold to various persons. On fol. 129v begins commentary on Benjamin ben ZerahÌ£'s Yotser de-Shabat Bereshit. On fol. 130v payments received by a teacher in Elul 5205 (1445). Levi ben Gershom's commentary starts on fol. 7r.
title: Commentary on the Writings (Job)
author: Levi ben Gershom
